step.stepresult: The page containing a list of work orders for the Production Units that you can access appear.

step.cmd: Select for the column header where you want to search for the work orders.
step.stepresult: A text box with search options appears.

step.cmd: Select the appropriate search option, and then enter a cell value for the selected column in the text box. For example, to search by priority, select in the PRIORITY column, and then enter the priority number of the work order.

info.note: To reset the filter options to their default values, select , and then in the window displaying the filter options, select Reset.

taskbody.result: The work orders based on the specified search criteria appear.
